name: Gommy Defensor medieval
overview: In the medieval era wars were the order of the day and in the castle of Gomilandia, everything was prepared for the enemy invasion. The kingdom was in game and at dawn the invading armies were already at the foot of the wall. Gommy he put on his armor and prepared to defend the square with his own ... but not everything was so easy, his superiors, the king, subjects, servants and soldiers they had disappeared. I looked for them everywhere but the battle was going to start, what to do? Finally decided to start the battle and dispatch anyone who dared to climb the high and imposing castle walls.
